pricing.title: Pricing Plans

items.question: How long does it take to launch?
items.answer: With subscription — from 3 days. We set up the platform for your brand, connect payments and hand over access. With license purchase — 1-2 weeks for deployment and setup.

items.question: Do I need developers?
items.answer: No! The platform is fully ready to use. All configuration is done through the admin panel without code. When purchasing a license, we help with deployment.

items.question: Can I customize the design?
items.answer: Yes. You can customize colors, logo, name and description. Growth and above plans include advanced customization. License purchase gives full source code access.

items.question: How do payments work?
items.answer: We integrate with Telegram Payments and Stars. You receive revenue from subscriptions and tickets directly. Platform commission — 0% on Enterprise plan.

items.question: What support is included?
items.answer: Starter — email support. Growth — priority support with 24-hour response. Enterprise — dedicated manager and 99.9% SLA.

items.question: Can I migrate an existing community?
items.answer: Yes! We'll help import members from a Telegram group or other platform. Migration is included in Growth plan and above.

items.question: What's included in the license purchase?
items.answer: Full platform source code, documentation, right to modify and commercial use. You host on your servers and own the data.

items.question: How secure is the platform?
items.answer: Data is stored encrypted. Two-factor authentication for admins. Regular backups. Enterprise plan offers on-premise hosting option.

items.question: Can I add custom features?
items.answer: Yes. Through API and webhooks you can integrate external services. License purchase gives full code access for any modifications.

items.question: Is there a trial period?
items.answer: Yes! 14 days free trial on Growth plan. You can also see a live example — MAIN community runs on our platform.
